Service.name: POW, Map Projection on the Web
Service.abstract_desc: POW provides users with the ability to find PDS planetary images using PILOT/UPC, select a subset, and send them to POW for ISIS processing, calibration, and map projection so that they are more usable.
Service.description: POW is part of the PILOT/UPC Web-based service that supports selection and transformation of a raw or EDR PDS image to a science-ready map projected image. POW allows the user to select and submit individual images to be processed on a compute cluster housed at USGS/Astreology using ISIS. POW provide users with calibrated cartographic images that can be used for geologic mapping, analysis in a Geographic Image System (GIS), change detection, merging of dissimilar instrument images, and use in a host of other scientific applications (e.g., ArcMAP, ENVI, Matlab, JMARS, etc.).
